org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.plain

Class ParentChildIndexFieldData.ParentChildEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.fielddata.plain.ParentChildIndexFieldData.ParentChildEstimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractIndexFieldData.PerValueEstimator
    Enclosing class:
    ParentChildIndexFieldData

    public class ParentChildIndexFieldData.ParentChildEstimator
extends Object
implements AbstractIndexFieldData.PerValueEstimator
    Estimator that wraps parent/child id field data by wrapping the data in a RamAccountingTermsEnum.
